description: Aachari Baa, a heartwarming drama starring Neena Gupta, streams on JioHotstar from March 14. Directed by Hardik Gajjar, the film follows the journey of Jaishnaviben Anopchand Vagadia, a woman who finds an unexpected bond with a mischievous dog while longing for her family's attention. Through humor and emotions, the film highlights themes of love, loneliness, and second chances. With performances by Kabir Bedi, Vatsal Seth, and Vandana Pathak, Aachari Baa is a must-watch drama on JioHotstar.
title: Aachari Baa OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch Neena Gupta’s Film Online?

description: A 10-day mission turned into nearly 10 months for NASA astronauts Butch Wilmore and Suni Williams after technical issues with Boeing’s Starliner spacecraft. Initially expected to return on Starliner, they were instead scheduled for SpaceX’s Crew Dragon, with their journey delayed until the arrival of Crew-10. NASA has now confirmed their return on March 16, as Crew-10 prepares for launch on March 12. The upcoming mission will allow the completion of this unexpected long-duration stay.
title: Boeing Starliner Astronauts Set To Return on March 16 After 10-Month ISS Stay

description: A newly released image taken from the ISS captures a rare gigantic jet of lightning extending over 50 miles above New Orleans. The photo, dated November 19, 2024, was discovered in the Gateway to Astronaut Photography of Earth database. These rare upward-shooting discharges occur when storm cloud charge layers invert, propelling energy skyward. The image, shared by Spaceweather.com, highlights the striking blue light and faint red tendrils, characteristic of these high-altitude electrical events. Scientists believe thousands of such jets occur annually, though few are ever documented.
title: ISS Captures Rare Gigantic Jet, a Massive Upward Lightning Over New Orleans

description: A new trailer confirms My Hero Academia: Vigilantes will premiere on April 7, 2025. The anime adaptation of Hideyuki Furuhashi and Betten Court’s manga will stream on Crunchyroll across various regions. Directed by Kenichi Suzuki, the series follows Koichi Haimawari, an unlicensed hero who operates outside the system. Alongside Pop☆Step and Knuckleduster, he fights crime where pro heroes fail. Featuring a cast led by Shuichiro Umeda, the anime brings a darker take on the My Hero Academia universe.
title: My Hero Academia Vigilantes OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch it Online?

description: NASA’s planned launch of the SPHEREx and PUNCH missions aboard a SpaceX Falcon 9 rocket has been postponed. Originally set for March 8 at Vandenberg Space Force Base, the launch was delayed as SpaceX conducts additional vehicle checkouts. SPHEREx will focus on mapping the universe using infrared light, while PUNCH will examine solar wind and coronal mass ejections. A revised launch date will be announced once SpaceX completes technical assessments.
title: NASA Delays SPHEREx and PUNCH Missions Due to SpaceX Vehicle Checks

description: Neela Nira Sooriyan, a Tamil film that delves into gender identity and societal struggles, is now available on Aha Tamil. The film, directed by Samyuktha Vijayan, was first released in cinemas on October 4, 2024. Featuring Kitty Krishnamoorthy, Geetha Kailasam, and Masanth Natarajan in supporting roles, the film has received recognition at various film festivals, including IFFI and the Glasgow Film Festival. With its release on International Women’s Day, the film is now accessible to a wider audience.
title: Neela Nira Sooriyan Now Streaming on Aha Tamil: Everything You Need to Know

description: Ponman, the dark-comedy thriller starring Basil Joseph, is set for its OTT debut on JioHotstar from March 14. The film, directed by Jothish Shankar, was released in theatres on January 30 and received positive reviews. It follows the story of a gold dealer caught in a dangerous situation when a wedding deal turns into a life-threatening scheme. Shot across various locations in Kollam, Ponman earned ₹10.05 crore at the box office. Its digital release is expected to bring a wider audience to the film.
title: Ponman OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch Basil Joseph’s Dark Comedy Online?

description: Rocket Lab has announced that its Neutron rocket will launch in late 2025, aiming to address the growing demand for medium-lift launch services. The rocket will be recovered at sea using a modified offshore barge, enhancing mission flexibility. The company has also introduced a new satellite platform, Flatellite, designed for large-scale satellite constellations. In addition, Rocket Lab’s Electron rocket continues launching missions, with a contract signed with Japan’s iQPS for multiple satellite launches over the next two years.
title: Rocket Lab’s Neutron Rocket to Land at Sea, First Launch Set for 2025

description: The 2024 film Vanvaas, featuring Utkarsh Sharma, Nana Patekar, and Simrat Kaur, is set to premiere on ZEE5 on March 14, 2025, marking its digital debut on Holi. Directed by Anil Sharma, the film explores the intricacies of a father-son relationship. While Vanvaas received positive critical feedback, its box office performance was impacted by competition. Now, the OTT release gives audiences a chance to watch it from home.
title: Vanvaas OTT Release Date: Utkarsh Sharma, Nana Patekar’s Film to Premiere on ZEE5

description: Apple and Meta Platforms are set to face modest fines for allegedly breaching the DMA acts. The EU antitrust enforcer is focused on making sure the companies comply with the law rather than sanctioning them, the sources said, explaining the rationale for modest fines.
title: Apple, Meta Said to Face Modest Fines Over DMA Breaches in EU

description: Split Fiction, the co-op action-adventure title from Hazelight Studios, is a hit. The game sold one million copies in the first 48 hours of launch, the It Takes Two developer confirmed Monday. It has also quickly risen to the top of Steam charts, displacing Capcom’s Monster Hunter Wilds as the top-selling title on the platform right now.
title: Split Fiction Sold 1 Million Copies in 48 Hours of Launch, Hazelight Studios Confirms

description: Telegram rolled out a new update last week that brings new features and improvements to the instant messaging platform. The company is now adding Chromecast support for Android users, letting them quickly cast any videos on the platform to a big screen. In addition, the company has also added several new security-focused features that will allow users to protect themselves from scams and spam.
title: Telegram Brings Chromecast Support for Android Devices, New Security Feature

description: On Tuesday, March 11 the US-based crypto exchange said it has completed its registration with India’s Financial Intelligence Unit (FIU). In the coming months, the exchange plans to introduce new retail services alongside additional products and investment offerings in India.
title: Coinbase Gains FIU-India Registration, Highlights India's On-Chain Talent

description: Garmin has launched its Enduro 3 series of rugged smartwatches in India. The new range arrives with solar charging support and a claimed battery life of 110 hours in GPS mode. The lineup includes several health and fitness sensors to track heart rate, blood oxygen saturation level, sleep, energy level and more. The Garmin Enduro 3 series boasts an always-on AMOLED display and supports two-way messaging through the compatible app.
title: Garmin Enduro 3 Series With Solar Charging, Rugged Design Launched in India

description: Airtel has announced a partnership with Elon Musk’s SpaceX to deliver Starlink’s high-speed internet to its customers in India. This marks the first agreement in the country, pending SpaceX’s authorization to sell Starlink locally. The collaboration aims to offer Starlink equipment in Airtel stores, provide Starlink services to business clients, and connect rural communities, schools, and health centers across India.
title: Airtel Partners Elon Musk’s SpaceX to Bring Starlink Satellite Communications Services to India

description: Indiana Jones and the Great Circle is set to arrive on PlayStation 5 in Spring 2025. While publisher Bethesda hasn’t confirmed a release date for the platform yet, but a new report has leaked the launch details for the game on PS5, including pre-order information and available editions.
title: Indiana Jones and the Great Circle Will Reportedly Launch on PS5 in April, Pre-Orders to Open Soon

description: Luma AI, a Palo Alto-based artificial intelligence (AI) firm, released a new video generation AI model last week. Dubbed Ray2 Flash, the model is a distilled version of the recently introduced Ray 2 frontier video generation model. The company stated that the Flash model is both faster and cheaper than the large language model (LLM), while retaining the realistic video generation capabilities.
title: Luma AI Releases Ray2 Flash AI Video Model With Faster Generation Time

description: Realme Buds Air 7 will launch in India soon alongside the Realme P3 5G and the P3 Ultra 5G handsets. The company has confirmed the design and key features of the audio wearables. They are claimed to offer a total battery life of up to 52 hours. The TWS earphones were initially introduced in China in February. The India variant will share similarities with the Chinese counterpart.
title: Realme Buds Air 7 India Launch Date Set for March 19; Design, Colour Options and Features Revealed

description: Samsung Galaxy Book 5 series has been launched in India. The latest laptop lineup by South Korean brand includes three entries — Galaxy Book 5 Pro, Galaxy Book 5 Pro 360 and Galaxy Book 5 360. The Galaxy Book 5 series is powered by Intel Core Ultra processors (Series 2) with an NPU that's said to deliver up to 47 TOPS for AI-based features. The Copilot+ PCs offer AMOLED display with up to 3K resolution. The Pro models feature quad speakers with Dolby Atmos. The laptops bring several Galaxy AI capabilities and they are claimed to deliver up to 25 hours of battery life on a single charge.
title: Samsung Galaxy Book 5 Pro, Galaxy Book 5 Pro 360, Galaxy Book 5 360 With Intel Lunar Lake CPUs Debut in India

description: Thailand’s Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) has added USDT and USDC to its approved token list. The Bank of Thailand will also explore their use in financial settlements.
title: Thailand Approves USDT and USDC for Crypto Trading and Banking Settlements

description: Apple has discontinued several iPad and Mac models following the launch of the MacBook Air (2025), iPad Air (2025), and other M4 SoC-powered products last week. Popular models such as the MacBook Air (2024), iPad Air (2024), and the 10th generation iPad (2022) have been phased out to make room for the newer models. The Cupertino-based company also appears to have removed the Mac Studio (M2 Max, 2023) and (M2 Ultra, 2023) from its website following the launch of the new model which can be purchased with an M4 Max or the newly launched M3 Ultra SoCs.
title: Apple Discontinues M3-Powered MacBook Air, M2-Powered iPad Air and Other Devices

description: iQOO Neo 10R has been launched in India on Tuesday. The latest Neo series handset by Vivo sub brand comes in two colour options and has a Snapdragon 8s Gen 3 chipset under the hood. It boasts an AMOLED display with 1.5K resolution and up to 120Hz refresh rate. The device has an IP65 dust and splash-resistant build. The iQOO Neo 10R flaunts a 50-megapixel dual rear camera unit. It houses a 6,400mAh battery with support for 80W charging.
title: iQOO Neo 10R With Snapdragon 8s Gen 3 Chipset, 6,400mAh Battery Launched in India: Price, Specifications

description: Oppo Reno 13 5G is now available in a new finish and new RAM and storage configuration in India. The latest Reno series phone was unveiled in the country in January, in two colour options with 8GB RAM and up to 256GB storage. The new colour variant of the Oppo Reno 13 5G comes with 12GB RAM and up to 512GB storage.
title: Oppo Reno 13 5G Sky Blue Colour Variant Launched in India in New RAM and Storage Option

description: Sudowrite, a Los Angeles-based AI startup, launched a new fiction-writing artificial intelligence (AI) model last week. Dubbed Muse, the AI model is built with a single function of generating creative writing pieces focused on fiction. The new model will be offered on the Sudowrite platform, which also offers several other writing-focused AI models.
title: Sudowrite Launches Muse AI Model That Can Generate Narrative-Driven Fiction

description: Elon Musk has claimed that the reason why X went down intermittently on Monday was a strong cyberattack. His comments drew skepticism from cybersecurity specialists, who pointed out that attacks of this nature — called denials of service — have repeatedly been executed by small groups or individuals.
title: Elon Musk Blames X Outage on Cyberattack

description: In 2024, India’s Web3 developer community grew by 28 percent, adding over 4.7 million developers to GitHub. According to the India Web3 Landscape Report (2024) by Hashed Emergent, 45.3 percent contribute code, 29.7 percent fix bugs, and 22.4 percent focus on documentation.
title: India Added 4.7 Million Web3 Developers in 2024, Set to Surpass US: Hashed Emergent

description: The acting chief of the US Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) said on Monday he has directed staff to look at ways to abandon a plan that would have widened the definition of alternative trading systems to include some cryptocurrency firms.
title: US SEC to Move Away from Requiring Crypto Firms to Register as Trading Systems, Chief Says

description: Apple could be working on a foldable iPad, and a tipster revealing details about its display. The tablet is expected to feature a large screen with Face ID. Unlike recent iPhones, which integrate Face ID sensors into the Dynamic Island, the foldable iPad Pro is said to adopt under-display Face ID technology, showcasing Apple's push toward innovative design.
title: Apple's Foldable iPad Pro to Sport 18.8-Inch Screen With Under-Display Face ID, Tipster Claims

description: Asus announced the VU Air Ionizer series of monitors on Monday. Available in 23.8-inch, 27-inch, and 34-inch screen sizes, they come with in-built ionizers which, the company claims, can reduce up to 90 percent of airborne dust within three hours of activation, delivering improved air quality. All models promise up to 100Hz refresh rate, along with TUV Rheinland-certified Low Blue Light and Flicker-Free technologies which are advertised to reduce eye strain.
title: Asus VU Air Ionizer Series Monitors With Airborne Dust Reduction and 100Hz Refresh Rate Announced

description: Gemini in Gmail is getting a new feature that will make it easier for users to set up Google Calendar events. Announced on Monday, the Mountain View-based tech giant is rolling out a new button that can be tapped to create and save a Calendar event. The AI chatbot can automatically identify emails where Calendar event-related information is shared, and then use that information to set up the event.
title: Gemini in Gmail Getting a New Button That Can Automatically Create Google Calendar Events

description: Nothing Phone 3a and Nothing Phone 3a Pro were launched in India earlier this month and are now available for purchase. They are powered by Snapdragon 7s Gen 3 SoCs and are equipped with 50-megapixel triple rear camera units. The handsets ship with Android 15-based NothingOS 3.1, IP64-rated dust and splash resistant builds and an upgraded Glyph Interface.
title: Nothing Phone 3a Series Now Available for Purchase in India: Price, Launch Offers

description: Earlier this month, Samsung announced the expansion of its One UI 7 Beta programme to include its flagship foldables, the Galaxy Z Fold 6 and Galaxy Z Flip 6 in select regions. As per a new report, the update brings two of the most popular features from the Google Pixel Fold to the Galaxy Z Fold 6. Users can now take advantage of the swipe to continue functionality on the main screen, in addition to an improved taskbar which appears with a half-swipe.
title: Samsung’s One UI 7 Beta Brings Swipe to Continue, Auto-Hiding Taskbar Features to Galaxy Z Fold 6: Report

description: Grok can now be summoned in the top level replies on posts on X (formerly known as Twitter), and the chatbot will respond to users. When the artificial intelligence (AI) chatbot is tagged in the reply to a post, it already comes with the contextual understanding of the content, and can answer queries to even the vaguely worded prompts.
title: Grok AI Chatbot Can Now Be Accessed in the Replies of Posts on X

description: Lenovo Idea Tab Pro confirmed to launch in india soon. The Chinese tech brand is teasing the arrival of its new Android tablet through its India website. It will go on sale in the country through Amazon. Lenovo unveiled the Lenovo Idea Tab Pro during the CES 2025. It runs on a MediaTek Dimensity 8300 processor and offers a 12.7-inch screen with a 144Hz refresh rate.
title: Lenovo Idea Tab Pro Teased to Launch in India Soon; to Be Available on Amazon

description: Microsoft is said to readying a PC gaming handheld for launch this year, with plans to bring the Xbox Series S/X successor in 2027, a new report has claimed. The company is working with an OEM to bring a partner handheld device to market in 2025.
title: Microsoft Readying Xbox Gaming Handheld for 2025, Plans to Launch Next-Generation Console in 2027: Report

description: Apple is reportedly planning a major redesign of iOS, iPadOS, and macOS with iOS 19, iPadOS 19, and macOS 16. The updated software will include a revamped interface aimed at simplifying device operation. While Apple Intelligence features continue expanding to more regions, the new interface could serve as a strategy to encourage users to upgrade from older devices, enhancing user experience across iPhones, iPads, and Mac computers.
title: Apple's iOS 19, iPadOS 19 and macOS 16 Updates to Arrive With 'Dramatic' Redesign: Report

description: Xiaomi 15 Ultra and the base Xiaomi 15 handsets were launched in India on Tuesday. They are powered by Snapdragon 8 Elite chipsets paired with up to 16GB of RAM. The phones carry Leica-backed rear camera modules and 32-megapixel selfie shooters. They run on Android 15 with HyperOS 2.0 skin on top out-of-the-box and sport IP68-rated builds.
title: Xiaomi 15 Ultra, Xiaomi 15 With Snapdragon 8 Elite SoC Launched in India: Price, Specifications

description: Infinix Note 50X 5G is scheduled to be launched in India on March 27. Ahead of its anticipated debut, a new report has surfaced which suggests that the phone may come with Android 15-based operating system (OS) dubbed XOS 15. It will reportedly bring a new One-Take Wallpaper feature that enables users to set a unified appearance across the home screen, lock screen, and other screens. The update is also said to offer more personalised customisation options, a Dynamic Bar for alerts and notifications, and other features.
title: Infinix Note 50X 5G to Reportedly Come With Android 15-Based XOS 15: Features

description: Finding the right juicer mixer grinder is essential for smooth cooking. Whether you need a powerful 1400W machine for heavy-duty tasks or a compact 750W grinder for everyday use, Myntra's Birthday Blast Sale has top brands like Philips, Bosch, and Morphy Richards at discounted prices. From juicers with XL feeding tubes to high-performance grinders with stainless steel jars, this list covers the best options available. Check out the deals and upgrade your kitchen with the perfect appliance.
title: Myntra Birthday Blast Sale: Top 10 Juicer Mixer Grinder Deals You Can't Miss

description: Myntra’s Birthday Blast Sale is live, bringing exciting discounts on the best smartwatches and wearables. Whether you need a feature-packed fitness tracker, a premium AMOLED smartwatch, or a stylish smart ring, this sale has it all. With top brands like Timex, Fastrack, NOISE, boAt, and Realme, enjoy Bluetooth calling, SpO2 monitoring, AI assistants, and long battery life at unbeatable prices. From budget-friendly options to high-end picks, now’s the time to upgrade your wearable tech. Grab your deal before stocks run out!
title: Myntra Birthday Sale: Top 10 Deals on Wearables You Can't Miss

description: Xiaomi appears to be developing the next T series comprising the Xiaomi 15T and Xiaomi 15T Pro models. The expected launch timeline of Xiaomi 14T series successors is still a long time away, but the rumor mill has already started leaking details about the Xiaomi 15T series. Most recently, the codenames and model numbers of the upcoming phones have leaked online. The Xiaomi 15T is expected to run on the MediaTek Dimensity 8400 Ultra chipset. The Xiaomi 15T Pro, on the other hand, could feature a MediaTek Dimensity 9400+ SoC under the hood.
title: Xiaomi 15T, Xiaomi 15T Pro Codenames Spotted in Latest HyperOS 2.1 Code, Model Numbers Revealed: Report
AI PC Perfection! Meet the All-New Samsung Galaxy Book5 Pro and Book5 Pro 360

description: Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge is expected to join the existing Galaxy S25 series handsets, which were unveiled globally in January. The Edge variant will be slimmer than the other smartphones in the lineup. It has been tipped to get a smaller battery than the vanilla model. Now, the phone has appeared on a certification site, which suggests that it will likely pack a smaller battery than the Galaxy S25.
title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge Battery Size Surfaces Online Via UL Demko Listing

description: Android 16 is said to be in development as the next iteration of Google’s operating system (OS) for smartphones. Ahead of its anticipated rollout which is expected to happen in the summer, a new report suggests that the Android update might add new tools for external display management. It is speculated to give users the ability to rearrange external screens while also making it easier to switch between mirroring the screen on the display or simply extending it.
title: Android 16 May Introduce Mouse Cursor Transitions and Other xternal Display Management Tools

description: Apple on Monday released the iOS 18.4 Beta 3 update for iPhone to developers and beta testers. Unlike the previous developer beta 2 update which brought Visual Intelligence to the iPhone 15 Pro among other changes, the latest version does not contain any standout new features. It is considered a minor update aimed at addressing bugs and introducing fixes for security vulnerabilities. iOS 18.4 Beta 3 resolves issues discovered in previous versions related to Apple Intelligence, Notifications, Siri, Wi-Fi Calling, Writing Tools, and more.
title: Apple Rolls Out iOS 18.4 Beta 3 Update for iPhone With Fixes for Apple Intelligence and Siri Issues
